articles.author: Karyn Maughan and Jan Gerber
articles.title: Public Protector paid 'fugitive from justice' Ngobeni R87k for articles bashing Mkhwebane foes - News24
articles.description: Paul Ngobeni was disbarred in several states in the US and, after being charged with several counts of larceny, forgery and practising while not an attorney in 2007, he went on the run from American law enforcement agencies.
articles.content: "Fugitive from justice" Paul Ngobeni was credited for suggesting Public Protector Busisiwe Mkhwebane sue the government for "insufficient funding", while he collected massive pay cheques from her off… [+468 chars]
